text: The Shadow of Hate is a 1995 American short documentary film about racism directed by Charles Guggenheim. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short.1996|Oscars.org ==Summary== The film expresses the history of oppression, discrimination, violence and hate in America.Review: ‘The Shadow of Hate’ documentary warns against violence of racism — HS InsiderFILM - "The Shadow of Hate"|American Friends Service Committee ==References== ==External links== * *Excerpt Category:1994 films Category:1990s documentary films Category:American films Category:American documentary films Category:American independent films Category:English-language films Category:Films directed by Charles Guggenheim Category:Documentary films about racism in the United States Category:Short documentary films
